test_cases.name: At ECR panel set selector switch=BRIDGE

steps.message:
Verify:
- ECR panel in command
- Buzzer sounds on all panels
- LED flashing over TAKE CMD on bridge

test_cases.comment: Accept to take over the command from ECR.
test_cases.name: BM1 Accept  Command
ECR Take Over with Lever Alignment

steps.message:
Verify:
- Waiting for ACKN from BM1

Verify:
- ACKN notification stops
- Buzzer off

test_cases.comment: ECR accepts to transfer command to BM1
test_cases.name: ECR Accept Transfer to BM4
